constants.name: sun equatorial radius
constants.description: the equatorail radius (aka semi-major axis) of the sun

constants.name: sun escape velocity
constants.description: the minimum speed needed for an object to escape from the gravitational influence of the sun

constants.name: sun mass
constants.description: the mass of the sun

constants.name: sun mean density
constants.description: the mean ratio of the mass of the sun to the volume of space it takes up

constants.name: sun sidereal rotation period
constants.description: the time it takes the sun to make a whole spin around itself

constants.name: sun surface gravity
constants.description: the gravitational acceleration experienced at the surface of the sun

constants.name: semi major axis
constants.description: the semi major axis of earth modeled by the wgs84.

constants.name: semi minor axis
constants.description: the semi minor axis of earth modeled by the wgs84.

constants.name: flattening
constants.description: the flattening of earth modeled by the wgs84.

constants.name: first eccentricity
constants.description: the first eccentricity of earth modeled by the wgs84.

constants.name: second eccentricity
constants.description: the second eccentricity of earth modeled by the wgs84.

constants.name: speed of light
constants.description: the speed of light in vacuum.

constants.name: planck constant
constants.description: the quantum of action.

constants.name: reduced planck constant
constants.description: planck constant divided by 2 pi.

constants.name: gravitational constant
constants.description: a constant regarding the force between two objects, depending on their masses and distance

constants.name: elementary charge
constants.description: the electric charge of a single proton
